content: back in nyc and it feels electric  hitting up my fave coffee spot before diving into work. time to reset, sharpen my trading game, and see what the city's got cooking in blockchain.
raw_content: The buzz of NYC is like no other. Feels good to be back, even if it's with a bit of a restart button on my career. First stop: coffee at my favorite spot. Time to start fresh, dive into my trading strategies, and explore the city's blockchain scene.
